original_text: He took into exile in Babylon those who had escaped from the sword, and they became servants to him and to his sons until the establishment of the kingdom of Persia,
korean_text: 칼에서 살아 남은 자를 그가 바벨론으로 사로잡아가매 무리가 거기서 갈대아 왕과 그의 자손의 노예가 되어 바사국이 통치할 때까지 이르니라

sentences.original_text: He took into exile in Babylon
those who had escaped from the sword
and they became servants to him and to his sons
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그들은 그와 그의 아들들을 섬기는 종이 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: until the establishment of the kingdom of Persia
